name: Food Fighter (haroldo-ok)
description:
This is a food-themed shoot-em-up for the Sega Master System. It is heavily inspired by MegaMania

Github Repo: https://github.com/haroldo-ok/food-fighter
Page on SMS Power: https://www.smspower.org/forums/18954-CodingCompetition2022FoodFighterByHaroldoo...

This is a ROM for the Sega Master System; in order to run it, you will need either an emulator, or you can even run in the real hardware, if you want.
